languages.text: "А я, согласно твоему плану, должен был умереть". {n}Проктор поднимает ладонь, хранящую невидимый след инфоклейма.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "А я, согласно твоему плану, должен был быть уже мертв, не так ли?" {n}Арбитес поднимает ладонь, хранящую невидимый след инфоклейма.{/n}

languages.text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}
languages.original_text: "А я, согласно твоему плану, должен был умереть". {n}Проктор поднимает ладонь, хранящую невидимый след инфоклейма.{/n}

languages.text: “而且，按照你的计划，我早就该死了。”{n}索罗蒙举起了手，手上被打下了看不见的数据印记。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而且，按照你的计划，我早就该死了。”{n}索罗蒙举起了手，手上被打下了看不见的数据印记。{/n}

languages.text: «Y se suponía que yo, según sus designios, debía morir». {n}Solomorne muestra la palma de la mano que porta el estigma invisible de la marca de datos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y se suponía que yo, según sus designios, debía morir». {n}Solomorne muestra la palma de la mano que porta el estigma invisible de la marca de datos.{/n}

languages.text: "Planına göre benim de ölmem gerekiyordu." {n}Solomorne, veri damgasının görünmez izini taşıyan avucunu kaldırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Planına göre benim de ölmem gerekiyordu." {n}Solomorne, veri damgasının görünmez izini taşıyan avucunu kaldırıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「そして、お前の計画によると、俺は死ぬはずだったということか」{n}ソロモーンはデータ刻印の目に見えないマークのある手のひらを上げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そして、お前の計画によると、俺は死ぬはずだったということか」{n}ソロモーンはデータ刻印の目に見えないマークのある手のひらを上げる。{/n}

languages.text: « Et moi, selon votre plan, je devais mourir. » {n}Solomorne lève une paume, révélant la marque invisible du fer à marquer numérique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Et moi, selon votre plan, je devais mourir. » {n}Solomorne lève une paume, révélant la marque invisible du fer à marquer numérique.{/n}

languages.text: "Und ich sollte laut Eurem Plan sterben." {n}Solomorne hebt die Hand hoch, auf dessen Fläche das unsichtbare Mal des Datenbrandeisens prangt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And I, according to your plan, was supposed to die." {n}Solomorne raises the palm of his hand that holds the invisible mark of the data-brand.{/n}
